testsuite.name: Test pending features (@pending on Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements)

testcase.name: non-pending Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements alongside pending ones must execute the test assert
non-pending Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements alongside pending ones must execute the test report
non-pending Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements alongside pending ones must execute the test not assert
non-pending Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements alongside pending ones must execute the test not report
non-pending Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements alongside pending ones must execute the test rule
non-pending Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements alongside pending ones must execute the test valid
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending not assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending not report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending rule
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending valid
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with zero-length @pending must be Pending assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with zero-length @pending must be Pending report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with zero-length @pending must be Pending not assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with zero-length @pending must be Pending not report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with zero-length @pending must be Pending rule
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with zero-length @pending must be Pending valid
